txt.en:
Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation. 

Red Dawn:Increases Critical Damage bonus by 5%

Riddermark: Increases Damage bonus by 5%

Rohirrim: Increases  War-steed armour bonus by 50

Rohirrim: 
 +100 War-steed Armour  
 
 Riddermark: 
 +5% Damage
 
 Red Dawn: 
 +5% Critical Damage
